item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][mnky_testimonial_slider][mnky_testimonial name="Adam Love" author_dec="Client" position="Designer" img_url="2635"]These guys do pretty amazing job. Quality and attention to details in their products is hard to find anywhere else. I would definitely recommend to try out one of their products and see it yourself.[/mnky_testimonial][mnky_testimonial name="Betty Cuda" author_dec="Fan" position="Developer" img_url="2635"]I have found out about this company only a month ago and I fell in love with their products right away. Can’t wait to see you guys at World Design Expo in New York. Cheers![/mnky_testimonial][mnky_testimonial name="Dee End" author_dec="Supporter" img_url="2635"]Last few years I was closely following company activities and always trying out their latest products, and needless to say, I was never disappointed. It is nice when company constantly improves[/mnky_testimonial][/mnky_testimonial_slider][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="60px"][vc_column_text]

And now with sliding animation..

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][mnky_testimonial_slider flex_animation="slide"][mnky_testimonial name="Adam Love" author_dec="Client" position="Designer" img_url="2635"]These guys do pretty amazing job. Quality and attention to details in their products is hard to find anywhere else. I would definitely recommend to try out one of their products and see it yourself.[/mnky_testimonial][mnky_testimonial name="Betty Cuda" author_dec="Fan" position="Developer" img_url="2635"]I have found out about this company only a month ago and I fell in love with their products right away. Can’t wait to see you guys at World Design Expo in New York. Cheers![/mnky_testimonial][mnky_testimonial name="Dee End" author_dec="Supporter" img_url="2635"]Last few years I was closely following company activities and always trying out their latest products, and needless to say, I was never disappointed. It is nice when company constantly improves[/mnky_testimonial][/mnky_testimonial_slider][/vc_column][/vc_row]
